meanings.definition: A small, detailed image or representation.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used a microprojection to show us the tiny details of the leaf.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the microprojection of the cell under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The artist's microprojection of the butterfly was so small, it looked like a speck of dust!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a microprojection, capturing every small moment in vivid detail.
meanings.sent5: The microprojection of the starry sky on the ceiling made the room feel magical.

meanings.definition: The act of projecting something on a small scale.
meanings.sent1: The company used microprojection to display the logo on a tiny screen.
meanings.sent2: The microprojection of the map on the wall helped everyone see the details clearly.
meanings.sent3: The magician's microprojection of a rabbit on his palm amazed the audience!
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were like microprojections, small but full of meaning.
meanings.sent5: The microprojection of the movie on the phone screen made it feel like a cinema.
